description: Working in the UI team within the IT Security organization. Designing and developing solutions for multiple web applications that deal with identity and privileged access management.
modules: • Working in the UI team within the IT Security organization
• Designing and developing solutions for multiple web applications that deal with identity and privileged access management
• Developing and implementing new features to Cisco’s OneID web platform using JavaScript, React and Redux
• Implementing APIs to internal and external services for security, monitoring, and identity purposes

description: Designing and developing a fully responsive business website
Designing and developing a customised version of a web tool for clients such as American Express, Mercedes-Benz, Nomad Foods, Capitec South Africa, and Societe Generale HK.
Redesigning and developing a web application during my first year as a Computer Science student via the Broadening Horizons programme at Kingston University
